title: make sharding policy pluggable
description: allow users to specify their own sharding policy.

comments.author: Erick Erickson
comments.content: I think this is a duplicate of SOLR-2592. If you disagree, please re-open.

comments.author: jiangwen wei
comments.content: This does not mean the same thing as SOLR-2592. This mean users can develop a plugin to determine which shard a document should stay when indexing.
